mapper.insert: insert into insure_nostruct_report (id, hosp_code, visit_no,visit_id,mdtrt_sn, mdtrt_id, psn_no, otp_ipt_flag, exam_test_flag, appy_no, file_name, file_formate, exam_test_rpot, vali_flag, is_trans) values (#{id},#{hospCode},#{visitNo},#{visitId},#{mdtrtSn},#{mdtrtId},#{psnNo}, #{otpIptFlag},#{examTestFlag},#{appyNo},#{fileName},#{fileFormate},#{examTestRpot},#{valiFlag}, #{isTrans})

insert into insure_pathological_report (id, hosp_code, mdtrt_id, psn_no, palg_no, frozen_no, cma_date, rpot_date, cma_matl, clnc_dise, exam_fnd, sabc, palg_diag, rpot_doc, vali_flag, is_trans) values (#{id},#{hospCode},#{mdtrtId},#{psnNo},#{palgNo},#{frozenNo},#{cmaDate} ,#{rpotDate},#{cmaMatl},#{clncDise},#{examFnd},#{sabc},#{palgDiag},#{rpoDoc},#{valFlag},#{isTrans})

insert into insure_bacterial_report (id, hosp_code, visit_id, mdtrt_sn, psn_no, appy_no, rpotc_no, germ_code, germ_name, coly_cntg, clte_medm, clte_time, clte_cond, exam_rslt, fnd_way, exam_org_name, vali_flag, is_trans) values (#{id},#{hospCode},#{visitId},#{mdtrtSn},#{psnNo},#{appyNo},#{rpotcNo},#{germCode} ,#{germName},#{colyCntg},#{clteMedm},#{clteTime},#{clteCond},#{examRslt}, #{fndWay},#{examOrgName},#{valFlag},#{isTrans})

insert into insure_drugsensitive_report (id, hosp_code, visit_id, mdtrt_sn, psn_no, appy_no, rpotc_no, germ_code, germ_name, sstb_code, sstb_name, reta_rslt_code, reta_rslt_name, ref_val, exam_mtd, exam_rslt, exam_org_name, vali_flag, is_trans) values (#{id},#{hospCode},#{visitId},#{mdtrtSn},#{psnNo},#{appyNo},#{rpotcNo},#{germCode} ,#{germName},#{sstbCode},#{sstbName},#{retaRsltCode},#{retaRsltName},#{refVal}, #{examMtd},#{examRslt},#{examOrgName},#{valFlag},#{isTrans})
mapper.select: select id, hosp_code, mdtrt_id, psn_no, palg_no, frozen_no, cma_date, rpot_date, cma_matl, clnc_dise, exam_fnd, sabc, palg_diag, rpot_doc, vali_flag, is_trans from insure_pathological_report where hosp_code =#{hospCode} and is_trans='0' and visit_id =#{visitId}

select id, hosp_code, visit_id, mdtrt_sn, psn_no, appy_no, rpotc_no, germ_code, germ_name, coly_cntg, clte_medm, clte_time, clte_cond, exam_rslt, fnd_way, exam_org_name, vali_flag, is_trans from insure_bacterial_report where hosp_code =#{hospCode} and is_trans='0' and visit_id =#{visitId}

select id, hosp_code, visit_id, mdtrt_sn, psn_no, appy_no, rpotc_no, germ_code, germ_name, sstb_code, sstb_name, reta_rslt_code, reta_rslt_name, ref_val, exam_mtd, exam_rslt, exam_org_name, vali_flag, is_trans from insure_drugsensitive_report where hosp_code =#{hospCode} and is_trans='0'and visit_id =#{visitId}

select id, hosp_code, mdtrt_id, psn_no, palg_no, frozen_no, cma_date, rpot_date, cma_matl, clnc_dise, exam_fnd, sabc, palg_diag, rpot_doc, vali_flag, is_trans from insure_pathological_report where hosp_code =#{hospCode} and visit_id =#{visitId}

select id, hosp_code, visit_id, mdtrt_sn, psn_no, appy_no, rpotc_no, germ_code, germ_name, coly_cntg, clte_medm, clte_time, clte_cond, exam_rslt, fnd_way, exam_org_name, vali_flag, is_trans from insure_bacterial_report where hosp_code =#{hospCode} and visit_id =#{visitId}
